resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2822</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Getting to know you.-lesson plan</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beginnen, you.-lesson Plan zu kennen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Finir par savoir le plan de you.-lesson</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Conhecer a planta de you.-lesson</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Familiarizzazione con programma di you.-lesson</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γνωριμία να είναι γνωστό το σχέδιο εσύ-μαθήματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Familiarización con plan de you.-lesson</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A lesson plan for carrying out individual informal conversations with students in order to assess their listening skills, oral expression, their vocabulary and to learn more about them</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oral expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">conversation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">questions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Lektionplan für durchführende einzelne 
formlose Gespräche mit Kursteilnehmern zwecks ihre hörenden 
Fähigkeiten, Mundausdruck, ihren Wortschatz festsetzen und mehr über
sie erlernen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un plan de leçon pour différentes conversations
sans cérémonie de mise en oeuvre avec des étudiants afin d'évaluer
leurs qualifications d'écoute, expression orale, leur vocabulaire et 
apprendre plus au sujet d'elles</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma planta da lição para conversações 
informais individuais realizando-se com estudantes a fim avaliar suas 
habilidades escutando, expressão oral, seu vocabulário e aprender 
mais sobre eles</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un programma di lezione per le conversazioni 
informali diverse d'avanzamento con gli allievi per valutare le loro 
abilità ascoltanti, espressione orale, il loro vocabolario ed 
imparare loro più circa</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα σχέδιο μαθήματος για την πραγματοποίηση των 
μεμονωμένων άτυπων συνομιλιών με τους σπουδαστές προκειμένου να 
αξιολογηθούν οι δεξιότητες ακούσματός τους, προφορική έκφραση, 
το λεξιλόγιό τους και για να μάθει περισσότερους για τις</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un plan de la lección para las conversaciones 
informales individuales que realizan con los estudiantes para evaluar 
sus habilidades que escuchan, expresión oral, su vocabulario y 
aprender más sobre ellos</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mundausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gespräch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fragen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortschatz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression orale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">conversation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">questions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vocabulaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão oral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">conversação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">perguntas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">vocabulário</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">espressione orale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">conversazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">domande</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">vocabolario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προφορική έκφραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">συνομιλία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ερωτήσεις</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λεξιλόγιο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">expresión oral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">conversación</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">preguntas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">vocabulario</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
